data.text:
@ChuckGrassley There is a reason why the @GOP wants to ban #CriticalRaceTheory and other honest discussions about race in America. #PartyOfLincoln?

Read my article at: https://t.co/7vMMyXWiJp

@ChuckGrassley What about  all the unlimited amounts of dark money in the @GOP?
The @GOP law for the 1% allows nonprofit organizations to receive  unlimited amounts of Russian money  without reporting to the gov such the NRA. PUTIN'S BLOOD MONEY. Your silence is deafening .
@ChuckGrassley What about passing the #EQUALAct There are Iowans that support this bill.
@ChuckGrassley Kind sums it up. No? https://t.co/bjVZ2WgKvb
@ChuckGrassley I remember those “town meetings.”  Still waiting on DJT, Jr.’s transcript old man.

@ChuckGrassley Kentucky Senator Mitch McConnell and his wife, Elaine Chao, have the financial, political influence in China to help stop the persecution of Uyghurs in Xinjiang. 
McConnell can also help China stand up against Putin.

@ChuckGrassley Iowa Senator @ChuckGrassley endangers life of Zalensky after posting images of Ukraine briefing on Twitter defying Zalensky’s explicit request not to do so for security reasons.  https://t.co/5rKm4kPSjx
@ChuckGrassley Wow, all 36! Hmm! Not very representative compared to the 81 mil who voted for PresBiden!  Resign!
